description: JOIN US FOR AN EXCLUSIVE GATHERING OF RWA ELITES AND DECISION MAKERS Day 2 of TOKENISED HK highlights one of the most important topics in RWA tokenization industry - privacy and security. Meet the experts in the security solutions, lawyers, investors, and infrastructure providers. We believe the real value is in real cases, that's why TOKENISED HK will focus on a certain topic on each day of our 4-day event series. 4 nights of RWA and Tokenisation focused discussion in an exclusive and private whisky and cigar club, located in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong. Food and drinks provided, accepted guests must be 21 years of age, access is curated and subject to available space.
